item.title: RFK Jr. Is Supporting mRNA Research—Just Not for Vaccines

item.title: The Black Market for Fake Science Is Growing Faster Than Legitimate Research, Study Warns
item.description: A small but growing number of academics are improperly taking credit for articles, citations, and authorships, allowing them to appear prestigious without having conducted their own research.
